com.facebook.react.modules.network

类 ForwardingCookieHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.CookieHandler
      • com.facebook.react.modules.network.ForwardingCookieHandler

  • public class ForwardingCookieHandler
extends java.net.CookieHandler
    Cookie handler that forwards all cookies to the WebView CookieManager. This class relies on CookieManager to persist cookies to disk so cookies may be lost if the application is terminated before it syncs.
